title: My First Boat Ride
story: This is my first boat ride, Patricia. It's mine too, Sandra. Is it safe? I thinks so. Daddy goes all the time. He told me we can row the boat. Row the boat? Yes. Take this oar and row. Wow. This is fun. We are moving.
summary: Join Sandra and Patricia on their first boat ride as they discover the excitement of rowing a boat for the first time.
image: An illustration of Sandra and Patricia in a boat, with one of them holding an oar and the other looking excited.
